section.name: About Ingest Engine
section.p: The Ingest Engine module contains the core ingest engine implementation. It is a lightweight server process that is controlled by the Apache ZooKeeper.

The Ingest Engine is the next generation high-performance data ingestion service for HORIZON. It is designed from ground up as a service engine. The multithreaded engine serves two main purposes - add and delete. The add operation is to retrieve files from remote provides. The delete operation is to remove files from its staging area.
